description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana
title: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana
content:
Buri mubyeyi wese iyo atwite aba yizeye ko azabyara umwana umeze neza kandi bitamugoye. Nyamara mu Rwanda, turacyate umubare munini w’abagore n’abakobwa bapfa babyara n’uw’abana bapfa bavuka. Abandi bahura n’ibibazo igihe batwite cyangwa babyara ku buryo bibasigira ubumuga (ababyeyi cyangwa abana babo). Akenshi, ubuzima bubi bw’umubyeyi, burimo n’indwara z’ibyorezo ziba zitaravuwe neza mbere cyangwa umubyeyi atwite, ni bimwe mu bitera impfu z’abana, kuvuka igihe kitageze cyangwa bakavuka bate ibiro bidahagije, bikabatera ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo. 

Ibibazo by’umubyeyi utwite n’umwana we bishobora kugabanuka iyo: (1) umubyeyi ate ubuzima bwiza, arya neza mbere yo gutwita n’igihe atwite, (2) yisuzumisha byibura inshuro 1 mu gihembwe igihe atwite, (3) abyariye kwa muganga (4) umubyeyi n’umwana bakurikiraniwe ha na muganga mu masaha 24, mu cyumweru cya mbere, no mu byumweru bitandatu nyuma yo kubyara.

Abashakanye babana na virusi itera SIDA cyangwa bakeka ko bashobora kuba baranduye, bagomba kwegera muganga cyangwa umujyanama w’ubuzima wabi huguriwe bakagirwa inama mu gihe batwite z’ukuntu bakwiyitaho n’uburyo barinda umwana kwandura mu gihe batwite, mu gihe cyo kubyara no mu gihe cyo konsa.

Leta ite inshingano zo, kwita ku buzima bw’umubyeyi wese mu gihe atwite na nyuma yo kubyara, akitabwaho n’umuntu ubitiye ubumenyi buhagije. Niba ari umukozi, umukoresha agomba kubahiriza uburenganzira bwe.

Ababyeyi benshi ndetse n’abangavu bahura n’ibibazo mu gihe batwite bijyanye no kudahabwa serivise nziza akenshi biturutse ku bushobozi buke, urugendo rurerure kugira ngo bagere kwa muganga, cyangwa kutagira amakuru ahagije. Leta ibinyujije mu buyobozi bw’ibanze n’abajyanama b’ubuzima babifashijwemo n’imiryango itegamiye kuri leta, bate inshingano zo gushaka ibisubizo ku bibazo by’ubuzima bw’ababyeyi n’abana mu rwego rwo kubahiriza uburenganzira bwabo.

Mu rwego rwo kurwanya imfu z’ababyeyi n’abana, Leta y’u Rwanda yashyizeho ingamba nyinshi zirimo nko gushyiraho politiki yo kwita ku buzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana, kwegereza abaturage serivise z’ubuzima zinoze (kongera ibigo nder abuzima mu turere dutandukanye, no kubyongerera ubushobozi) ndetse no kongerera ubumenyi n’ubushobozi abajyanama b’ubuzima n’ibindi.
